job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description:
Description
Development and unit testing code for both existing legacy systems and new Development initiatives.
Implement solutions utilizing Object Oriented Programming and commonly related Data Structures
Communicate with team members to clarify requirements in able to meet team goals
Provide input to the team to develop cutting-edge solutions to maximize performance, scalability, and distributed processing capabilities of the solution
Attend Standup, kickoff and team meetings to provide status of current work, suggest opportunities for improvements and communicate challenges to ensure cohesion with all team members
Work with their team in an agile context as it relates to software development
Facilitate and participate in daily code reviews with the team
Qualifications
Degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline
0-2 or more years’ experience engaging with software/test engineers on enterprise level software development projects
0 -2 years’ experience with basic programming techniques
0 -2 years’ experience with OOP, Data Structures and Algorithms
Knowledge of SaaS (Software as a Service), PaaS (Platform as a Service), and IaaS (Infrastructure as a Service) solutions
Knowledge of API’s, Web Services and Forms development
Ability to code in a functional or OOP language
Ability to code basic SQL statements
Understanding of object-oriented design and development
Understanding of Agile or Lean Software Development experience such as Kanban or Scrum
Ability to successfully work within a team and manage a dynamic environment with rapidly changing priorities
Excellent problem-solving skills
Positive team player attitude with excellent verbal and written communication skills
Self-motivated and willing to “do what it takes” to get the job done
High degree of organizational skills
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Self-motivation to learn new methodologies that will enhance job performance
Corporate overview
Here at UKG, Our Purpose Is People. UKG combines the strength and innovation of Ultimate Software and Kronos, uniting two award-winning, employee-centered cultures. Our employees are an extraordinary group of talented, energetic, and innovative people who care about more than just work. We strive to create a culture of belonging and an employee experience that empowers our people. UKG has more than 13,000 employees around the globe and is known for its inclusive workplace culture. Ready to be inspired? Learn more at www.ukg.com/careers
